member.name: T:MatrixMath
member.summary: Represents a utility class for matrix math operations.

member.name: M:MatrixMath.Inverse2D(System.Double[0:,0:])
member.summary: Calculates the inverse of a 2D matrix.
member.returns: The inverse of the input matrix, or [-1] if the matrix is not 2D or non-invertible.
